name: NATIONAL READY MIXED CONCRETE ASSOCIATION
description: Association representing producers of ready mixed concrete
sampleDescriptions: Monitor the Reauthorization of the National Flood Insurance Program and advocate for resilient construction and usability standards, as well as improved public and private data sharing and integration
Monitored the Continuing Resolution and Omnibus appropriations process, as well as resilient construction and disaster safety.
Monitor Tax Reform technical correction efforts and also advocated for resilient construction incentives in future tax legislation.
